title.title: Buses will replace trains while Jubilee line is improved

texts: While track replacement work is being carried out to improve the Jubilee line, train services between West Hampstead and Wembley Park are being suspended on Saturday and Sunday 30 and 31 July.

On that weekend the Jubilee line will therefore be operating in two separate sections. A train service will run between Stanmore and Wembley Park and another train service will run between West Hampstead and Stratford.

TheMetropolitan line will also be suspended south of Wembley Park.
